cause.description:
To help out in this cause you need to be strong minded and be less hurt at jokes and comments/ smirks. Once we have accomplished that we can help each other and acompolish more than we ever had.
1. Smarter World
2. More focus towards important aspects of society
3. Less Cry Babies
cause.mission: make people less sensitive and more focused on the important things
cause.name: A Less Sensitive World
